events.message: We have successfully received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's software developer skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this software developer candidate's recruitment process.
The initial phone screening was completed with the candidate where their experience with devops and software development was discussed in detail.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in moving forward with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate with our lead software engineer for a deep dive into coding and architecture challenges.
